item1:
改变货物属性
Change article attributes
item2:
由人工设定改变货物属性Stock Category
Article attributes Stock Category can be changed manually
item4:
获得属性更改的指示
Get an indication of a property change
item5:
库存明细信息查询条件
Inquiry conditions for inventory details
item6:
更改库存明细信息属性
Change inventory details properties
item7:
如果无符合条件的托盘明细数据，系统将提示查无可用库存明细信息，用户可执行Data Inquire-->Q080 Inventory Data Query作业查询库存明细信息；
If there is no qualified pallet detail data, the system will prompt to check that there is no available inventory detail information. The user can perform Data Inquire-> Q080 Inventory Data Query job to query inventory detail information
item8:
1. 输入查询条件后点选Query查询托库存明细信息清单
Enter the query conditions and click Query to query the inventory details list
item10:
限同一托盘明细行的属性改变；如果有部分改变，则需求先做P060 Transfer Out及P070 Pallet Inventory Adjustment后才能实施
Only the attributes of the same pallet detail line can be changed; if there are partial changes, you need to do P060 Transfer Out and P070 Pallet Inventory Adjustment before implementing
